events.message: I received the wrong item and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under refund based on customer claims about incorrect item delivery.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! I'm Emily from support. I'm sorry to hear about the issue. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received for verification?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo of the item that clearly shows it is incorrect.
Thank you for the details. I will initiate the refund process immediately and send you instructions for returning the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will follow the return instructions.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since everything seems resolved, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
